B342DA5F391342B1B7202CE055262714.description: Language Acquisition Criterion D - Using language in spoken and written form: Organizes thoughts, feelings, ideas, opinions and information in spoken and written form and develops accuracy when speaking and writing in the target language

50F10A21FD914EE8A85D20F6B81BF1A4.description: Language Acquisition Criterion C - Communicating in response to spoken, written and/or visual text: Interacts and communicates in various situations, expresses thoughts, feelings, ideas, opinions and information in spoken and written form, and speaks and writes for specific purposes

CEC285CB1846476AB90FFB82116F0010.description: Language Acquisition Criterion B - Comprehending written and visual text: Reads for specific purposes and respond to show understanding, interprets visual text that is presented with written text, engages with the text by supporting opinion and personal response with evidence and examples from the text

DF0C0B61015648F0BD09E0196E3A9BE2.description: Language Acquisition Criterion A - Comprehending spoken and visual text: Listens for specific purposes and respond to show understanding, interprets visual text that is presented with spoken text, engages with the text by supporting opinion and personal response with evidence and examples from the text
